events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position and will review it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for further processing by our recruitment team.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your candidature and will be in touch soon.
We completed your initial screening interview with positive feedback on your technical skills and experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and interest in moving forward with the technical interview for the software developer role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 10 AM UTC. Please prepare accordingly for coding and system design questions.
You have successfully completed the technical interview, impressing the panel with your problem-solving skills and knowledge.
Your HR interview is scheduled for May 8th, where we will discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
The HR interview went very well, showing strong alignment with our team values and a keen interest in your professional development.
We are pleased to propose you an employment offer for the Software Engineer position, including competitive salary and benefits.
